alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jackson and northwestern Bennett Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Hisle, or 14 miles north of Martin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hisle around 535 PM MDT. Eagle Nest Butte around 545 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
